title: How Queen Letizia of Spain became the ultimate modern royal style icon
text:
If many little girls dream of princess-dressing in glittering gowns and diamond tiaras, then their modern-minded, grown-up counterparts could do worse than aspire to the glossy, polished style of Queen Letizia of Spain. Her contemporary and fashion-forward approach to royal dressing (think leather leggings and on trend co-ords) has become a signature in the five years since she and her husband King Felipe ascended the throne, seeing her referred to as ‘the world’s most stylish royal’ and, along with our own Duchess of Cambridge and Duchess of Sussex, widely credited with reinventing royal style for the 21st century.
